basics.name: Jetoine Mathurin
basics.summary: Results-driven IT professional with 8+ years of experience delivering enterprise-level systems and network support. Proven expertise in Microsoft ecosystem management, ServiceNow implementations, and federal compliance standards. Specialized in streamlining IT operations through automation and process optimization, with a track record of reducing system deployment times and improving user satisfaction across diverse environments.

work.name: Digital Alchemy Labs Inc
work.summary: Led comprehensive IT infrastructure projects including system provisioning, security compliance, and technical support operations for enterprise clients.
highlights: Orchestrated deployment of 150+ Windows systems using Intune and SCCM, achieving 99% success rate
Executed secure decommissioning procedures following NIST SP 800-88 standards for 200+ devices
Delivered hybrid on-site and remote support, maintaining 95% client satisfaction rating
Streamlined incident management workflows through ServiceNow optimization, reducing resolution time by 30%

work.name: Target Corporation
work.summary: Provided critical technical support for point-of-sale systems and mobile devices across retail operations, ensuring minimal downtime during peak business periods.
highlights: Resolved 95% of ServiceNow incidents within SLA timeframes, supporting 500+ retail devices
Performed comprehensive diagnostics and assessments, reducing device replacement costs by 25%
Developed troubleshooting documentation that decreased average ticket resolution time by 40%

work.name: Perkins & Will
work.summary: Managed technology integration projects for architectural firm, focusing on AV systems, workstation deployment, and process documentation.
highlights: Deployed and configured 80+ workstations with standardized imaging protocols
Integrated AV systems across 12 conference rooms, improving collaboration efficiency by 35%
Created comprehensive ServiceNow documentation workflows, reducing onboarding time for new technicians by 50%

work.name: Medica
work.summary: Supported critical healthcare IT infrastructure including Windows/Linux environments, Microsoft 365, and Active Directory services while maintaining HIPAA compliance.
highlights: Successfully led Skype for Business to Microsoft Teams migration for 1,200+ users with zero data loss
Maintained 99.8% system uptime across hybrid Windows/Linux environments
Streamlined Active Directory user provisioning processes, reducing account creation time by 60%
Ensured HIPAA compliance across all technical support activities

work.name: Comm-Works
work.summary: Coordinated large-scale hardware deployment projects and logistics operations while maintaining detailed project tracking and documentation.
highlights: Configured and deployed 300+ POS systems and Cisco networking equipment across multiple locations
Managed project timelines through ServiceNow, achieving 98% on-time delivery rate
Created standardized configuration procedures, reducing setup time per device by 45%
Coordinated cross-functional teams to ensure seamless hardware rollouts

work.name: DRC
work.summary: Delivered multi-platform technical support across diverse operating systems while building comprehensive knowledge management resources.
highlights: Provided expert support for macOS, Linux, Windows, and Chrome OS environments
Developed 25+ knowledge base articles in ServiceNow, reducing repeat incidents by 40%
Maintained 92% first-call resolution rate across all supported platforms

work.name: DecisionOne
work.summary: Managed complex incident resolution using multiple ticketing systems while supporting enterprise software migrations and system integrations.
highlights: Executed Windows 7 to Windows 10 migration for 800+ workstations with 99% success rate
Utilized ServiceNow, Workfront, and Remedy for comprehensive incident management
Supported SCCM deployments and SAP CRM implementations across enterprise environment
Maintained AV infrastructure ensuring 99.5% uptime across corporate facilities
